Best of Morocco, A Women's-Only Tour | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Best of Morocco, A Women-Only Tour 11 days | Casablanca roundtrip Discover the diverse and captivating landscapes of Morocco on this exclusive 11-day women-only tour with Insight Vacations . Travel with a small group and begin your journey in Casablanca, where you'll visit Morocco's largest mosque. Indulge in a wine-paired lunch with the owner, who will share insights into Moroccan wine, giving you a taste of the country's rich culinary heritage. Experience the mesmerizing art of belly dancing, a traditional Moroccan art form that will enchant and delight you. As you journey through the rugged red mountains of Dades Valley, marvel at the breathtaking scenery and sip wild-herb tea alongside local nomads, immersing yourself in their way of life. Continue your adventure to Marrakesh, where you'll have the opportunity to explore one of Morocco's most impressive kasbahs. Located at the gateway to the Sahara, this earthen clay fortress is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a testament to Morocco's rich history and culture. During your time in Marrakesh, you can choose to visit a traditional Moroccan spa for a relaxing and rejuvenating experience, or opt to meet the inspiring women of a local cooperative. This MAKE TRAVEL MATTER® Experience will allow you to connect with local women, learn about their lives and work, and gain a deeper understanding of Moroccan culture. Deal Details Travel Dates 11 May, 21 Jun, 12 Jul, 9 Aug, 21 Sep 2025 Priced From $7,015 per person Enquire Now Discover the diverse and captivating landscapes of Morocco on this exclusive 11-day women-only tour with Insight Vacations . Travel with a small group and begin your journey in Casablanca, where you'll visit Morocco's largest mosque. Indulge in a wine-paired lunch with the owner, who will share insights into Moroccan wine, giving you a taste of the country's rich culinary heritage. Experience the mesmerizing art of belly dancing, a traditional Moroccan art form that will enchant and delight you. As you journey through the rugged red mountains of Dades Valley, marvel at the breathtaking scenery and sip wild-herb tea alongside local nomads, immersing yourself in their way of life. Continue your adventure to Marrakesh, where you'll have the opportunity to explore one of Morocco's most impressive kasbahs. Located at the gateway to the Sahara, this earthen clay fortress is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a testament to Morocco's rich history and culture. During your time in Marrakesh, you can choose to visit a traditional Moroccan spa for a relaxing and rejuvenating experience, or opt to meet the inspiring women of a local cooperative. This MAKE TRAVEL MATTER® Experience will allow you to connect with local women, learn about their lives and work, and gain a deeper understanding of Moroccan culture. Pricing 21 Jun, 12 Jul 2025 from $7,015* per person, twin share 11 May, 9 Aug, 21 Sep 2025 from $7,080* per person, twin share Itinerary Day 1 Welcome to Casablanca Day 2 Rabat, Imperial Meknes and Fes Day 3 Fes Sightseeing Day 4 The Ziz Gorges to Erfoud Day 5 Desert Town of Rissani Day 6 Spectacular Ouarzazate Day 7 To Marrakesh Day 8 Marrakesh, Pearl of the South Day 9 elegant Essaouira Day 10 Return to Casablanca Day 11 Au revoir Casablanca Highlights Visit the iconic Hassan II Mosque in Casablanca and explore the historic Royal Palace and Hassan Tower in Rabat. Admire the Bab el-Mansour Gate in Meknes and wander through the ancient Medina of Fes, exploring hidden courtyards, mosques, and workshops. Enjoy the beauty of Erfoud, a desert oasis and explore the fascinating Todra Gorge in Tinerhir. Discover the quiet town of Ouarzazate and its red sandy streets and visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Ait Benhaddou. Experience the bohemian coastal town of Essaouira the bustling markets and vibrant atmosphere of Marrakesh. Inclusions 9 nights' accommodation at select hotels. Meals, including 10 breakfasts, 3 lunches, 1 lunch with wine & 6 dinners with wine. Personal radio headsets give you the freedom to wander during visits to famous highlights, without missing any of your Local Expert's fascinating commentary. Hotel and restaurant tips are included - you'll never have to worry about how much to give, nor search for foreign currency. We also include all taxes and porterage charges at hotels. We carry your bags for you and promptly deliver them to your hotel door. From time to time, your Travel Director will delight you with an Insight Flourish, which is a local specialty representing the destination. Stay connected with friends and family with our complimentary coach and hotel Wi-Fi (where available). If your arrival and/or departure flights are as per the itinerary start and end dates, then transfers are available at scheduled times. If your flights are outside these times, or you have booked additional nights accommodation with Insight Vacations, you may purchase transfers or make your own way from/to the airport. Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
